parser.epilog: For more detailed help, see USAGE.md in the root folder.

helps.autoupdate: Update all server(s) in the list.
helps.upgrade: Upgrade all server(s) to current version, including MCSH. WARNING: Under very early development, strongly unrecommended.
helps.repolist: List all server(s) in the repository.
helps.reposearch: Search for server(s) in the repository.
helps.reposhow: Show the specific package detail in the repository.

exceptions.fatal_lang_version_mismatch:
Locale file version didn't match with the program version.
Program version is {program}, but locale file version is {locale}.
This could be triggered by an improper installation and/or upgrade.
Please reinstall MCSH.
exceptions.error_file_corrupted_or_missing_download: The file {file_name} ({file_path}) is missing or corrupted. Trying to retrieve a new one from the repo...
The file {file_name} ({file_path}) is missing or corrupted. Some functionality of MCSH may be limited.
